quest.name: Unresolved Mysteries
journal:
 Quest Sync
Hierax would ask you a question with absolutely no ulterior motive whatsoever.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: Oho! You are Azem's familiar, are you not?

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: I pose to you a question: imagine an object you truly desire lies before you. What do you do?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Take it!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Shout “NEED”!

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: I see... As rumored, you do show a glimmer of intelligence. Avarice is a mark of sentience, you know.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, my pot of nectar has recently gone missing─along with the nymphai I was observing. Welcome as this confirmation of their intelligence is, they aren't meant to eat all of that at once.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: Of course, should I pursue them, they will like as not hide for fear of reprisal while they devour the lot. However, they may respond if a fellow familiar expresses herhis doubt that so much nectar truly belongs to them...if you take my meaning.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: I believe I caught a glimpse of the nymphai surmounting the fence to the southwest... I assure you, you will know them when you see them.

dialogue.name: BEAVERA04291
dialogue.text: <squeal>?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to doubt its sincerity...

dialogue.name: BEAVERA04291
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal> <squeal>!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...squeals in a presumably disgruntled fashion and waddles away.

dialogue.name: BEAVERB04291
dialogue.text: <squeal>?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to doubt its sincerity...

dialogue.name: BEAVERB04291
dialogue.text: <squeal>! <squeeeaaal>!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...waddles away, but not before you catch a strong whiff of nectar.

dialogue.name: BEAVERC04291
dialogue.text: <squeal>?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...squeaks innocently in response to your query, but you have ample reason to doubt its sincerity...

dialogue.name: BEAVERC04291
dialogue.text: <squeal> <squeal>!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The...nymphe?...waddles away, looking rather pleased with itself.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: You've returned! But where are my nymphai?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You should probably forget about those.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: B-Beavers...

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: What in the world are you talking about? Come now, tell me what you saw. Spare no detail─I'm a professional.

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: Strange, brown-furred creatures? That waddled!?

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: My nymphai were bright, and winged, a-and─ Oh... Oh, no...

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: No... No, that's absurd... Ha ha... Ha ha ha...

dialogue.name: HIERAX
dialogue.text: Tell no one of this. Some things are better off lost.
